title.rendered: Duct Cleaning Services Near Me: How to Find The Best From The Bunch

content.rendered:
You’ve probably found out just how much dirt and junk can build up inside your home’s air ducts, so now you are searching online for “duct cleaning services near me”. As with most home service providers, there are hundreds of options to choose from in pretty much every city. There are a few ways to find a reliable duct cleaning company that you can stick with for years to come. Let’s get started.

Duct Cleaning Services Near Me: Who NOT To Choose

A lot of cheap or inexperienced duct cleaning companies simply shove a vacuum hose into a duct and call it a day. This will, of course, remove some debris and dust, but that’s all.

There’s a lot going on inside your home’s ductwork, for example mold, pollen, etc. These contaminants won’t get picked by a rough vacuum cleaner. To clean out your ducts thoroughly and improve the indoor air quality, you need someone who is skilled and certified, and knows how to use specialized equipment.

So, if a company is not certified by the National Air Duct Cleaners Association (NADCA), they are obviously not serious about what they are doing. NADCA is well-known to set the standards for duct cleaning companies on how this delicate cleaning process must be handled. Choose “duct cleaning services near me” that can prove to you that they are following all these standards to the T. 

How To Choose The Best “Duct Cleaning Services Near Me” 

Check Out Their Online Reviews: For starters, the company should have good reviews online or from word-of-mouth. If you see a lot of negative testimonials about them on the internet, or your neighbors or friends had a bad experience working with them, steer clear of them.  

Do your due diligence when hiring someone off the internet. Check out their listing and customer reviews on sites like HomeAdvisor, Better Business Bureau, or Yelp. See how they engage with customers who have left less-than-stellar reviews, i.e., do they seem confrontational or arrogant?

Customer Satisfaction Guarantee: Some of the most well-established names in the home services industry, such as United Home Services, offer a 100% customer satisfaction guarantee. This essentially means that if you are not completely satisfied with the work of “duct cleaning services near me”, they will either give you your money back or work on the problem until you are happy.

They Should Be Willing To Put Their Money Where Their Mouth Is: Another thing to keep in mind is, if something seems too good to be true – it usually is. If a duct cleaning company claims they will clean your entire home’s ductwork for $99, they are most likely to charge you a bunch of add-ons and extras once they finish the job.

If the company says “no add-ons”, be sure to get that in writing beforehand. Ask them to give you a quote that shows a cost breakdown of everything they need to do while cleaning your ducts. 

#1 Dependable Duct Cleaning Services Near Me

Tired of trying to find a trustworthy home service provider? Give us a chance. United Home Services has been in the business for over 22 years, and we have mastered the fine art of making customers happy. 

Whether you are having any issues with your HVAC unit or just want to prevent the risk of coronavirus entering into your home’s indoor air, we can help. Call us at 866-847-7454 or reach us online to have a chat with us today!
